features.name: Know Your Enemy
features.desc:
As a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g}, a student of war can study a foe she can see and attempt a Knowledge {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} appropriate to the creature's type. Success grants her a +1 insight {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} against her enemy, which can be applied via one of the following stances (chosen when the check is attempted) to the indicated statistics and {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
Defensive Stance: The bonus applies to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} and on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}. At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 bonus to her AC against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
Martial Stance: The bonus applies on attack and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} against the target. At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 bonus to her {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}Crit{/g} confirmation rolls while in Martial stance.
Tactical Stance: The bonus applies on {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuver{/g} checks and to {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when initiating or defending against combat maneuvers.
A student of war can change her stance as a move {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}. The bonus increases to +2 at 4th level and +3 at 7th level.
At 7th level, the student can use this ability as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} rather than a move action.

features.name: Additional Class Skill
features.desc: At 1st level and every two levels after, student of war gains one {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} as a class skill.

features.name: Combat Feat
features.desc: At 2nd, 5th, and 8th levels, a student of war gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} combat {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.

features.name: Mind Over Metal
features.desc: At 2nd level, a student of war can use her {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} modifier in place of her {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}. The armor's normal maximum Dexterity {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} still applies (limiting how much of the character's Intelligence bonus she can apply to her AC).

features.name: Anticipate
features.desc: At 3rd level, student of war can withstand even mental and unusual {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with great will. If she makes a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} against an attack that normally deals half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} on a successful save, she instead takes no damage.

features.name: Martial Stance — Critical Focus
features.desc: At 4th level, the student of war gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} confirmation {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} while in martial stance.

features.name: Telling Blow
features.desc: At 6th level, a student of war can aim her blows at the weakest point in a studied foe's defense, ignoring up to 5 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. This does not apply to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction without a type (such as DR 10/-). This ability cannot be used against creatures that are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} or otherwise lack discernible weak points.

features.name: Defensive Stance — Mobility
features.desc: At 6th level, the student of war gets a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} while in defensive stance.

features.name: Nemesis
features.desc: At 9th level, once per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}, a student of war can focus on a weapon she holds and render it anathema to her studied foe. The weapon gains the bane {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special ability{/g} for 1 minute.

features.name: Deadly Blow
features.desc: At 10th level, a student of war can find weak spots where none should exist. A student of war who uses her know your enemy ability can ignore the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g}.
